Song.title: For You Are Holy
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Zach Jones © 2004 Sovereign Grace Worship

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [D2 | G2 | D2/F# | G2 | G2 |]
Verse 1: O [D2]God, there’s none like [G2]You In all the [D/F#]earth, in all the [G2]earth O [D2]God, who can com[G2]pare To [D/F#]You, to [G2]You [G]Only You have no beginning, [D/F#]only You could make the skies [G]Only You are truth unending, [D/F#]only You are [Asus]always [A]wise [Em7]Lord, there is [D/F#]none like [G2 | G2]You
Chorus: [G2]For You are [G2]ho[A]-[Bm]ly You are [G]ho[A]-[D2]ly For You are [G2]ho[A]-[Bm]ly [Dmaj7/A] [Em7]Lord You are [Asus]ho[D | G2 | D2 | G2 | D]ly
Verse 2: O [D]God, there’s none like [G2]You In all the [D/F#]earth, in all the [G2]earth O [D]God, who can com[G2]pare To [D/F#]You, to [G2]You [G]Only You are never sinning, [D/F#]only You have never lied [G]Only You cannot be tempted, [D/F#]only You can [Asus]never [A]die [Em7]Lord, there is [D/F#]none like [G2 | G2]You
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 o god theres none like you in all the earth in all the earth o god who can compare to you to you only you have no beginning only you could make the skies only you are truth unending only you are always wise lord there is none like you chorus for you are holy you are holy for you are holy lord you are holy verse 2 o god theres none like you in all the earth in all the earth o god who can compare to you to you only you are never sinning only you have never lied only you cannot be tempted only you can never die lord there is none like you
